alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Madison; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 4:54PM CDT until July 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... East central Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... South central West Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 454 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Darnell, or 12 miles west of Transylvania, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Darnell around 500 PM CDT. Monticello around 510 PM CDT. Warden around 520 PM CDT. Delhi, Waverly and Tendal around 535 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pioneer and Epps. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Madison; Richland; West Carroll
